page.title: 17PERSONAL RECOLLECTIONS
page.content: I interviewed my grandmother about life in this area and how it has changed over the years.Here are the questions and answers from the interview. JULIA.How long have you been living in the Antrim Road area? GRANNY.46 years. JULIA.Was the house you are living in built when you were a child? GRANNY.Yes. JULIA.What was transport like on the Antrim Road many years ago?Can you remeber trolley buses and trams? GRANNY.Not to many private cars, but quite a lot of trams.Yes I can remeber trolley buses and trams. JULIA.What changes have you noticed over the past 20 to 30 years? GRANNY.Increase in population,more houses,redevelopment,new chapels,increase in vandalism and
